title: Adobe Creative Cloud  2015 Complete Collection (64bit) + Crack
description:
* Photoshop
* Illustrator
* InDesign
* Audition
* Premiere Pro
* After Effects
* Lightroom
* Dreamweaver

It's very simple, and uses official channels to get the latest versions first.

1. Acquire an Adobe ID. It doesn't matter if it is real or fake, as long as you have never used a Creative Cloud trial before.
You can create an ID at Adobe.com, use a disposable inbox if needed.

2. Install the Creative Cloud from the folder provided or get it directly from Adobe, either one works.

3. Launch the Creative Cloud application and install any of the above applications and START THEIR TRIALS

4. Run the Creative Cloud Cracker underneath the Crack folder

5. Sign out of the Creative Cloud application via the Gear Menu > Preferences > Sign Out

6. Launch each application individually and accept the license terms

7. Enjoy

NOTE: SOME applications such as illustrator may show that it is in tryout mode, but it will never expire, use it as intended.
Some applications may also show trial days, ignore these, the application will not stop functioning
